description: Stretch one arm forward with your palm facing out and gently pull the fingers back for 10 seconds per hand.
Stretch your arm across your chest and pull it with the opposite arm for 10 seconds per side.
Using your hand, gently pull your head toward the right and then the left, holding the stretch for a few seconds each way.
Place both hands behind your head and guide it downward to stretch the back of your neck.
Cross one leg over the other and reach toward the floor with your arms extended. Switch legs and repeat.
While seated, open your legs and try to place your palms on the floor, holding for 5 seconds and repeating 3 times.
Pull one knee toward your chest and hold, switching legs after 10 seconds.
While seated, cross one leg over the other and lean your torso forward, switching legs after 10 seconds.
While seated, close your eyes and cover them with your palms for 2 minutes, then open them normally.
In an open space, look as far as you can in four directions for 3 seconds, moving only your eyes. Repeat 3 times.
Using your thumbs, massage the area beneath your eyebrows with circular motions for 15 seconds.
Standing, rotate your torso as far as you can to the left and hold for five seconds. Repeat to the right.
